Title: Downtown Crossing (2)
Plot: Joey is held up and forced to clean up her account by a street mugger, who is accidentally run over by a car just after mugging Joey. The merciful girl from Capeside stands by her aggressor, checking up on him and trying to get an ambulance and get him to the hospital after seeing the similarities between him and her own father. When the cops and paramedics arrive, Joey faints and is taken to the hospital. After recovering, she accidentally meets the mugger's estranged wife and daughter. Joey st
GuestStars: Samuel Ball, Mercedes Alicia McNab, Stephen Moore, Keith Flippen, Olivia Milo Pence
